entries.journal: Today I experimented with the use of chatGPT to help me write code for my application to track my productivity.  I had a few distractions, but they were minimal today.  Overall my focus is not as I would like it to be.  I need to train and push through this.  Remember the pain of the job interview and continue to push
entries.plan: Set up mockAPI for my data and have my data populate on create new post.  Sort by date.

entries.achievement: Finished allowing Edit and delete.  Page updates correctly.
entries.struggle: I was missing await on the API call and edit was not re-rendering properly because it was pushing a blank object into current state vs grabbing the proper fetch.
entries.journal: The code was somewhat difficult to write for this project.  I used a lot of state observation to trouble shoot, realizing that my state was firing correctly through the component but I was not rendering what I wanted successfully.  It took a lot of inspection, but I eventually discovered my missing word that caused my app to work successfully.  First time I have also implemented a mock back end with JSON server.  It helped to realize the server was patching correctly in discovering my mistake.
entries.plan: Set up and learn react Query.  I need to add error and loading handlers.
